API Reference¶

This reference provides detailed documentation for all modules, classes, and methods in the current release of Neurolearn. The root Neurolearn package is comprised of two modules: nltools.analysis and nltools.plotting. The analysis module contains functionality for prediction/classification, testing pattern response, and ROC analyses.

nltools.analysis: Analysis Tools¶
